Class Polynomial

java.lang.Object
  edu.purdue.bbc.util.equation.Polynomial
All Implemented Interfaces:
Equation
public class Polynomial
extends Object
implements Equation

Implements a Polynomial Equation.

Constructor Summary

          Creates a new Polynomial of degree 0, a.
Polynomial(double[] coefficients)
          Creates a new Polynomial with the given coefficients.

          Creates a new Polynomial of degree 1, ax1 + b.
Polynomial(double x0, double x1, double x2)
          Creates a new Polynomial of degree 2, ax2 + bx + c.
Polynomial(double x0, double x1, double x2, double x3)
          Creates a new Polynomial of degree 3, ax3 + bx2 + cx + d.
